sentences.sContent: People who drop litter can be fined in some cities.
sentences.sCn: 在有些城市，乱扔垃圾的人会被罚款。

sentences.sContent: a town with a litter problem
sentences.sCn: 存在乱扔垃圾问题的一个小镇

synos.tran: 垃圾；轿，担架；一窝（动物的幼崽）；凌乱

words.tran: 在街道或公共场所乱丢垃圾的人

trans.tranOther: if an animal such as a dog or cat litters, it gives birth to babies
waste paper, cans etc that people have thrown away and left on the ground in a public place
if things litter an area, there are a lot of them in that place, scattered in an untidy way
